rit.contoken
Interface DeviceStorageInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
DeviceStorage
public interface DeviceStorageInterface

Continuous Token Device Storage Interface (require an implementation)

Version:
1.0 Build 001 Sep 1, 2011.
Author:
Prach Chaisatien

Method Summary
 StatusMessage getGenFlag(java.lang.Object androidcontext)
          get the the generator's flag from the device storage
 StatusMessage getToken(java.lang.Object androidcontext)
          get the Token from the device storage
 StatusMessage saveGenFlag(boolean genFlag, java.lang.Object androidcontext)
          save the generator's flag
 StatusMessage saveToken(java.lang.String token, java.lang.Object androidcontext)
          save the Token to the device storage
 

Method Detail

saveToken

StatusMessage saveToken(java.lang.String token,
                        java.lang.Object androidcontext)
save the Token to the device storage

Parameters:
token - the Token to save
androidcontext - the Android context of the mobile application activity's class (to access the private device storage)
Returns:
StatusMessage indicate the saveToken operation status (success, failed, error etc...)
See Also:
android.content.Context, StatusMessage

getToken

StatusMessage getToken(java.lang.Object androidcontext)
get the Token from the device storage

Parameters:
androidcontext - the Android context of the mobile application activity's class (to access the private device storage)
Returns:
StatusMessage indicate the getToken operation status (success, failed, error etc...)
See Also:
android.content.Context, StatusMessage

saveGenFlag

StatusMessage saveGenFlag(boolean genFlag,
                          java.lang.Object androidcontext)
save the generator's flag

Parameters:
genFlag - the generator's flag to save, genFlag is determined by other method that indicate the internet connection status (DeviceConnectionInterface.checkconnection)
androidcontext - the Android context of the mobile application activity's class (to access the private device storage)
Returns:
StatusMessage indicate the saveGenFlag operation status (success, failed, error etc...)
See Also:
android.content.Context, StatusMessage, DeviceConnectionInterface

getGenFlag

get the the generator's flag from the device storage

Parameters:
androidcontext - the Android context of the mobile application activity's class (to access the private device storage)
Returns:
StatusMessage indicate the getGenFlag operation status (success, failed, error etc...)
See Also:
